definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: They always cant about world peace.
sentences.chinese: 他們一貫侈談世界和平。

sentences.english: The rich would have spoken on the value of thrift, and the idle grown eloquent over the dignity of labour.
sentences.chinese: 富人會談論節儉的價值，懶漢則侈談勞動光榮。

sentences.english: The lip service the Kuomintang paid to democracy particularly nauseated the Manchurians .
sentences.chinese: 國民黨侈談民主，尤其使滿洲人感到厭惡。
